### Electronic Health Record
Participated in the implementation of electronic health records at the hospital where I worked. As a supervising nurse in this digital transformation, I was actively involved, first in my own training for this new project and then in the training of the entire team.

- **Tools:**  EHR platform, Clinical documentation, Training and workflow guidelines, Internal communication tools.
- **Focus:**   Improve access to each patient's clinical information. Train clinical staff in digital workflows, ensuring compliance with hospital protocols and data protection regulations. Provide support in managing digital change. Standardize patient records, guaranteeing consistency and security.
- **Outcome:** Increased access to each patient's medical record, thereby improving decision-making and patient care. Greater staff confidence and adoption of the digital tool thanks to hands-on training and support.
